website_summaries.verdict: Works well as a temporary cage for protected outdoor excursions, but rabbits will need a sturdier indoor cage with a floor that discourages burrowing.
pros: Good for smaller rabbits, owners report
Works well indoors as well as outside
cons: Cage floor pieces don’t stay in place when moving hutch
Must be staked down outside to prevent predators from lifting the cage up
Too small for some adult rabbits

customer_reviews.title: Chicken Brooder
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Assembly was quick and easy - just needed a screwdriver. We added 3 chicks to our flock and this is the perfect size to brood them in. It will be a tight fit when they are full grown, but at that point we will introduce them to the flock. I'll definitely be saving this pen for future chicks.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B

customer_reviews.title: This hut is pretty awesome. It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This hut is pretty awesome. It was easy to put together, took about 25 minutes 5 pieces and 2 floor pieces (floor pieces are not worth using to me and they are don't stay in place when moving the hut). This works perfectly for my 2 guinea pigs when they need some outside time. I like that I don't have to worry about anything hurting them since the cage is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby chickens
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for baby chickens, however small banty chicks can fit through the wires. I had baby quail in mine for a short time and put screens around the sides. Standard chicks should be fine, though. It works great, but I will say that the quality is poor. I put an extra coat of sealant on mine and I'm glad I did. The wood isn't much stronger than cardboard. I put a stone mortar in the covered part that I clip a heat lamp to. Chicks are happy.
customer_reviews.author: SwallowTheMoon2

customer_reviews.title: HomeRun
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble, all is needed is a Phillips screwdriver. I did spray a sealant on the wood, inside and out. Will be used for a hen and her chicks. It is VERY light, and can be moved around without strain not like other ‘small’ coops I have had in the past. I added a handle (was less than $2) I got from the big box ‘home’ stores for easy carry. Other reviews have advised NOT to use with Bunnies, and I can see why. The wood is very light quality and does seem to look like wood that can be chewed through if you having an animal with chompers living in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Have several. Better products for your $ out there
customer_reviews.text: Pros easy to move. Cons. Guinea pigs eat it. Critters can move it. NOT water proof. Rain comes through door and soaks them. They chew it up. Floor in area rotted. Not worth the $$. Have to add snaps to door as critters can open it. Guess its okay for Full supervision short term use. But you would be better off with a metal play pen and kitty bucket than this as in the sun no ventilation in hut
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee k

customer_reviews.title: Good for tortoises
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our desert tortoise. It’s not watertight, but she has her own rain protection. When she is in the cabin she is off the ground. When the sun is shining she basks in the warmth of a protected environment. I really like that there are two openings.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Mae

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PUT ANIMAL IN OUTSIDE
customer_reviews.text: YOU CANNOT KEEP AN ANIMAL IN THIS OUTSIDE! If I hadn’t put this together I would return it immediately. Night one we got a small spring rain, went out there an hour into it.... everything was completely SOAKED! It was so wet I couldn’t even add more shavings after we put a tarp over it. Our poor quail were freezing and if we hadn’t went out there, who knows if they would have made it the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best purchase I have made
customer_reviews.text: Its small. It says it is for chickens, and I realize that dimensions were given, but you don't get how small it is until you put it together. Two full grown chickens max, without much room to roam. But then the door is funny too. It does not stay dry in the closed off area at all. IF you were buying this for a small rabbit or guinea pig, maybe worthwhile, not for chickens.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Heard

customer_reviews.title: Received broken
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed! I tried to cancel my order the same day I ordered it, because I realized it's too small for 3 ducks. I was told it was too late to cancel, but just to deny package at door if I was home. I would have to pay for return to stock fee. I decided to just keep it since I'm not always home and it would be too much trouble. I figured that I would try to build a bigger coop with it. I received it and when I opened the box it was broken! I don't have a back up plan for my ducks arriving tomorrow. This is very upsetting. I emailed and am waiting for a response.
customer_reviews.author: veronica mullins

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Hutch and No Service From Seller
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about getting this hutch because it looks cute. However, the quality is cheap and not very sturdy. Mine came damaged, a piece of wood was splintered off. I reached out to the seller with pictures but never got a refund or even a replacement. I would have expected better service from an amazon seller.
customer_reviews.author: dudu..

customer_reviews.title: Great for my tortoise!
customer_reviews.text: My turtle loves her new outdoor home! It was very easy to assemble just used a drill. I’ve had it for about a week now and it’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla purcell

customer_reviews.title: We love it. We use it in the house for ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We use it in the house for bunny when we are not home and overnight to keep him out of trouble. We also take it outside and place it inside a larger secure area when he gets some outside time in the grass in good weather. We mostly use it inside. I am not sure how well it would survive outside in the weather if it were set up as an outside hutch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I found this item! It is perfect for my young desert tortoises. It’s well made and easy to put together. I love that it affords shelter and outdoor contained space. It’s lightweight but not so much that it compromises durability. Would buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for chicks
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little hut for introducing chicks outside. They can move around freely and still get out of the sun. Just a note, this is NOT waterproof. You will also need two people to put it together, but it was easy to do. For the money, I think it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: CrimLaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great! I loved this. Easy to put together. Durable. I will say though if you have dogs, it’s easy for them at least it was for my Border Collie. Sadly left my dogs out for a couple hours and they got in a ate my bunny. (But totally my fault, Nature) I will say I would leave them out and they never could get in it. Just think I have them too much time. Anyways. Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: J Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together, just take your time. Helps to have second pair of hands but not necessary. Good quality for the money but is light weight and will need to stake down if out in yard. It came with all the hardware needed but I also used wood glue to help it hold to together better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for two  Guinea pigs for a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: I have two guinea pigs and I love to put them outside when it’s nice out, with this cage I can do exactly that and not have to worry about other creatures getting them. They absolutely love it and the fact that they can choose either to be in the sun or go inside to the shade is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kim E.

customer_reviews.title: Spacious. Easy to assemble. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: The enclosed area is perfect for my hedgehog to crawl into for when he goes to sleep—since hedgehogs are nocturnal! I usually just lay out the fleece and his toys and let him roam freely throughout the day but the coop is extremely spacious for him to already do so! I definitely can’t wait to use it outdoors! It was also extremely easy to put together. It only took 15 minutes without any power tools! The only thing was that the two boards that came with it were uneven but since there is no bottom, I just did away with it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. It is a little thin, and I would use wood glue on the pegs just to add a little strength. I don't know if it would be strong enough for a big rabbit, but it works great for my tortoises. The bottom of the shelter area falls out a little too easily, but doesn't effect what I am using it for. It screws together so it is relatively stable. Smells like cedar though.
customer_reviews.author: quijibo

customer_reviews.title: It fit her nicely and was great for both day and night outside
customer_reviews.text: I housed one chicken in here for a while as a temporary home. It fit her nicely and was great for both day and night outside. I wouldn't recommend this if you live in a cold place because there isn't really room for a heating lamp. Otherwise it worked really well
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for chickens
customer_reviews.text: Warning, this is not at all predator proof! I've been keeping my half grown chicks in it in the daytime, and my dogs got the idea to attack the cage. They simply pushed the whole wire in and popped it loose.
customer_reviews.author: 123fbc

customer_reviews.title: My guineas love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 3 little guinea pigs. I bought this so I can put my guineas out on the grass during warm sunny days. They love it!!! Easy to assemble and the cedar wood smells great. Really like this item
customer_reviews.author: Maria Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great Temporary Coop for Silkies
customer_reviews.text: I got this A-Frame hutch to separate my two pullet silkies from bigger hens. One was getting pecked really bad. It’s fairly small but works well for a temporary home for them until they can be reacclimated with the whole flock. The wood seems sturdy but very light weight. Super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Louis2112

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Small Animal Enclosure
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect cage for our guinea pig. It gives her room to run around plus a place to hide. Easy to assemble and the price was fantastic. As you can see from the photo there is not bottom under the cage portion of the enclosure. We use this as our guinea pig's secondary outdoor run so this isn't a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: amazonme

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works exactly as expected, considering the low price. I use it so my pet rabbit can have some safe outdoor time. There are two doors so it's easy to put the rabbit in and get her out. It's open on the bottom so she can eat all the grass she wants.
customer_reviews.author: setlib

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality but okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and how easy it is was to assemble but it is pretty cheap quality. It works for what we are using it for which is a rabbit hutch when her bigger one is being used to quarantine chickens — because these are not at all big enough for even 1 full sized chicken which is what I purchased for. This is good for temporary housing only for 1 rabbit, and it is even too small for long term housing for rabbit because there isn’t much room to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hitt

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This item worked perfectly for my guinea pigs. It took about 20 minutes to put together without any power tools. It's lightweight, pretty sturdy, and my piggies love it! They love being able to go out and eat grass on nice days and I don't have to worry about them getting out! The wood is flimsy, but it's perfect for what I need it for!
customer_reviews.author: Maresha G.

customer_reviews.title: went together easy enough but...
customer_reviews.text: The wood is very cheap. Probably won't last until this time next year. A bit overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: My bunnies love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little rabbit cage. I put some wire on the bottom tho only cause I didn't want my rabbits to dig out and still want them to eat the grass I also added a run to the side and I love them in the main part at night. All in all it's a really good hutch other then the wireless bottom if your going to keep it outside.
customer_reviews.author: sally j.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & is exactly what I needed to keep my ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great & is exactly what I needed to keep my Silkie chick indoors this winter. The enclosed flooring is warped but since he’s spoiled anyway I used a small blanket so his toes wouldn’t get caught between the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed. Paid twice as much for another that is of the same quality. Great quality, highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: MUCH higher quality than the one I bought last year. Definitely spray it with clear coat before using. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: A. Band

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bunny shelter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for two baby bunnies and they LOVE it. What's great is that it's so light that I can lift it up, set it aside, clean up their living area, and then set it down on top of them again. Can also use indoors or out. Highly recommend and it smells very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Works for out tortoise
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our baby tortoise. I am not sure how long it will last outside it is not solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 10-14 quail!
customer_reviews.text: Wire tie about 8 inches of 1/2 chicken mesh up the sides, then bottom use 1/2 inch wire stapled and cut to fit, i keep them outside mounted on post year round for quail, work great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Butler 1972

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use and my bunnies love it!
customer_reviews.text: My bunnies love it I don’t keep them in it permanently only about ten minutes a day but it’s cute and fun to watch them in it!
customer_reviews.author: Raycat43

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and easy to put together. This product met my expectations and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Yup. Looks right.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it looks like. Very easy to assemble. Light weight. Just a tiny bit smaller than what I thought. All in all its the product that I ordered and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great little house for my tortoise!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Russian tortoise’s outdoor enclosure to keep him locked up and safe at night. I absolutely love it! It was easy to put together, looks great, and works perfect for my tortoise. He puts himself to sleep in the house each night at sunset, so I love that I can shut the door to lock him in safely for the night. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used for baby chickens until they got older and we built onto the chicken house to make it bigger. So easy to assemble ‘I’ a woman can put it together. The wood is sturdy and easy to move from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My turtle loves this and it only took 10 minutes to put it together. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for your critters!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I needed this, until I got it. We use it for our turtles and just love it. They can't get out of the of it which is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ree Ree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet chickens
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 4 chickens who need to graze with protection from hawks! Not a set up for for night time since a raccoon/bear could easily turn the whole thing over. In my picture two of the chickens are in the little house part and two outside but all four fit perfect inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to assemble, nice wood
customer_reviews.text: It works but is kind of small to keep an animal in long term
customer_reviews.author: KELLI G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Overall
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much! Used to house our quail. So easy to move and clean out. The A frame design is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thomas Boos

customer_reviews.title: Small, but ok
customer_reviews.text: The smell coming off of the wood right out of the package was very concerning. We purchased this as a "condo" for a few chicks. It quickly became too small. It's much much smaller than anticipated. It has weathered well.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: They love it ( i think) they go inside the little ...
customer_reviews.text: We use it for our 6 box turtles. They love it ( i think) they go inside the little house when it's sunny and come out when it rains or whenrver really...
customer_reviews.author: Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a temporary
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a temporary, inexpensive home for our Silkie. The bottom of the inside portion is quickly getting warped, but for the price, I can not complain.
customer_reviews.author: ScooperReader

customer_reviews.title: looks nice but the wood came partially split
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit of a pain to put together and the wood was partially damaged out of the box, its holding together though and should work fine
customer_reviews.author: Newt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bunny loves it , great space but she started chewing on the wood already .
customer_reviews.author: yureily meneses

customer_reviews.title: ... have two quail and wanted to give them a nice outdoor living space
customer_reviews.text: I have two quail and wanted to give them a nice outdoor living space. This works perfectly and I haven't had any problems. For the price, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Fristensky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! And is absolutely perfect for my indoor bunny's needs.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The wooden bunny hutch was delivered more quickly than expected. It was very easy to assemble with a screwdriver. Our bunny now enjoys her time in the backyard, nibbling leafy weeds and grass. This is perfect for her as she is and will remain a small rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with amazing quality and is super spacious for our Bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lektorich

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If you dont want to have to rehole and reglue everything, dont buy this.If I didn't need it right away,I would have returned it. Upon receipt, it was split on one side and wood started chipping. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA MUMLEY

customer_reviews.title: I really like this little hutch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little hutch. Just the right size as an indoor pad for my bunnies. Easy to assembly, nice materials.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P. Panek

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape, not predator proof
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a broody silkie and chicks. However, I wouldn't use this without some kind of predator protection. We have a livestock guardian dog and we keep this near him.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Made cheap and not even big enough to fit one average size rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Tesha Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little hut for our tortoise to have time outside.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Walters

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all and fairly inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this little hutch! It was very easy to assemble. Thank you for shipping it so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t need a drill to put together. Can use Screw driver.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together even if you don’t have a drill. Piggies are so happy.
customer_reviews.author: NinaCSULB

customer_reviews.title: Great for small rabbits!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for our bunnies to be able to play in safely. We are easily able to move it to the grass when we want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money to me.
customer_reviews.text: Rabbit outdoor run and hutch was very well made and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Bunny house
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy. Made well and it is the perfect size It is also easy to assembly and clean. Plus my rabbit is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maines

customer_reviews.title: If I could change one thing...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, delivered on time in good condition. There is no bottom to this except on the wood covered den area and does not stop animals from burrowing in or out.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne P Cappadonna

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to have a place for my rabbit to get outside and play. It works well and was worth the money, great buy! :)
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Good for Brooding hens
customer_reviews.text: Used as a chicken brooder. The hen and her babies loved it. Could use a better latch.
customer_reviews.author: EmailZola

customer_reviews.title: Our bunny loves this. We used tent ground stakes ...
customer_reviews.text: Our bunny loves this. We used tent ground stakes to ensure no animals could tip it over during the night.
customer_reviews.author: V. Turner

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple months now and it is very sturdy! It looks just like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cage for my 2 guinea pigs for a couple months now and it is very sturdy! It looks just like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great, is a good size, and is heavy duty. Couldn't imagine a better product for this price
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Solid little outdoor area for my tortoise. Predator and bird proof. Suggest anchoring it down due to being lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Benito

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect size for a medium size to small size bunny ...
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect size for a medium size to small size bunny rabiar very sturdy and loved the smell easy to put together and by far the bet bang for your buck on Amazon gets the job done and is simple
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tor tortoises and bunnies would definetly recommend it to anyone!! And yes it will work for a tortoise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to ensemble, fast shipping, I bought for my tortoise.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for seperating Quail
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. I haven't used them yet but for the price they fit my needs. I did add a chicken wire bottom to it but for moving birds around and separating birds for slaughter and birds to keep they fit the bill. I have quail. I agree with others these are to small for more than 2 Chicken's depending the species.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is exactly what I was looking for to let my rabbit eat on the lawn for an hour at a time. It allows him to eat grass but get away inside the house part of the hutch if he feels at all threatened. Easy open door to get him in and out.
customer_reviews.author: bonami

customer_reviews.title: it's been great, a perfect size for a little yellow-bellied slider
customer_reviews.text: Using this as an enclosure for my turtle to get some natural UV rays without worrying about him wandering away, being picked up by a bird, or any other outdoor hazards for a tiny animal. So far, it's been great, a perfect size for a little yellow-bellied slider.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted as a temporary house for my silkie chickens. I was introducing two new chickens to an established flock and needed a way to seperate them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value - I use indoors and outdoors (waterproofed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value - I use indoors and outdoors (waterproofed the underside of the wood) for my pigeons and my rabbit and guinea pig.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Meyer Carvin

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived sooner then I anticipated. The wood was ceder. However, it was somewhat flimsy but for 45 dollars it wasn't too bad. The wood is much darker then the picture but still a nice shade of brown. I have yet to set it up. I will write a second review for that. I would reccomed this product to those looking for an inexpensive hutch with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for rabbits
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my rabbit, despite the soft wood it was pretty strudy and he wasn't able to break out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Alonso

customer_reviews.title: works well for small animal
customer_reviews.text: great for my one chicken. lightweight so I can move it around yard. Won't keep predators out at night because it is lightweight, but great for daytime use.
customer_reviews.author: lori degaetano

product_meta.title: PawHut Outdoor Triangular Wooden Bunny Rabbit Hutch/Guinea Pig House with Run
feature_bullets: Triangular shape keeps weather off of roof
Easy to set up and move
Outdoor run area provides place to run around

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
